title: Blueberry Lemon Cake
alt: Fresh baked blueberry lemon cake in cake pan.

instructions: Beat the butter, sugar, 3 Tbsp of lemon juice and eggs together in a bowl.
Combine the flour, baking powder and salt in a separate bowl.
Alternate between adding milk and dry mix into the egg mixture.
Add blueberries and lemon zest.
Transfer to a greased 8x4 loaf pan and bake for 60-70 minutes at 350deg
Cool for 10 minutes and transfer cake from pan to a cooling rack
combine remainign lemon juice and sugar to create the glaze; drizzle over cake and cool completey

title: Crab Ravioli
alt: Ravioli stuffed with crab and shrimp in a butter cream sauce topped with alaskan king crab and parmesean

instructions: Prepare ricotta cheese.Refrigerate
On a clean surface, make a mound with flour and create a well in the middle for the eggs
Pour egg yolks into the well of flour, along with olive oil, salt and water
Gradually beat flour towards the middle until all flour is incorporated into eggs.Add up to 3 additional Tbsp of water if too dry
Knead dough for 10 minutes until dough is smooth and elastic
Wrap ball of dough in plastic.Rest 30 minute
Prepare filling while dough rests
Sautee shrimp with butter and garlic until cooked
After shimp is cooked, remove shrimp
Mix cooked butter and garlic with ricotta
Chop shrimp into 1/4inch pieces & mix with ricotta
Add all other filling ingredients and stir until mixed together
Cut dough in half
On floured surface, roll dough to make a thin sheet(about 1/16inch thick)
Cut rounds using a 3 - 4 inch cookie cutter or the top of a glass
Brush the edge of each round with reserved egg white
Fill each round with about 1 Tbsp heap of filling
Fold over and pinch shut, making sure the pasta is completely sealed
Bring 4 quarts of salted water to a boil
In a large pan, over med - hi heat, sautee butter, garlic and shallots 2 - 3 minute
Dust in 1 1 / 2 T flour to create a roux
Add wine and reduce 2 - 3 minutes
Add all remaining ingredients, cook 3 - 5 min until sauce is thickened & bubbly
Boil ravioli 3 - 5 minutes until done.Gently remove and add to sauce
Lightly toss ravioli in sauce until coated
Serve topped with fresh parmesan and parsley
